name: self-host
description: A collection of Docker Compose configurations for self-hosting various services and applications.

name: openresty-prometheus
description: OpenResty with integrated Prometheus metrics for advanced monitoring and observability.

name: terraform-aws-github-oidc-iam
description: Terraform module for setting up GitHub OIDC with AWS IAM for secure, token-less authentication.

name: terraform-aws-s3-cloudfront-static-site
description: Terraform module for deploying a static website on AWS S3 with CloudFront CDN, including SSL support.

name: mern-assessment-app
description: A full-stack web application built using the MERN stack that enables administrators to create assessments with multiple-choice questions, and users to take these assessments via unique links and view their results upon completion.

name: time-to-review
description: A tool to analyze and improve PR review times and development workflow efficiency.

name: conventional-commit-validator
description: A validator to ensure commits follow the conventional commit format for better versioning and changelog generation.

name: jira-autolink-pr
description: A GitHub Action that automatically updates Pull Request titles and descriptions with Jira issue information, extracted from branch names.
